name: Sapiens Craft
description:
Sapiens is a crafting based management/idle colony simulator. You to start from small stone age band and grow through all of history.

You'll craft, research and manage your way through 8 ages: Stone, Bronze, Iron, Medieval, Exploration, Industrial, Modern and Future.

Explore over 300 unique crafts as you grow and advance.

Can you lead your workers to glory? Will you be a peaceful society or ruthless and pragmatic?

If you mange to survive and outpace your competition, you'll face a final challenge as a global government running a futuristic planet that is on the brink of extinction.
